sentences.en: Grandmother felt free to order her about just as she wished.
sentences.cn: 奶奶毫不客气地随意支使她。

sentences.en: He often runs errands for his grandmother.
sentences.cn: 他经常给他的祖母跑腿儿。

sentences.en: Her grandmother had the gift of making people happy.
sentences.cn: 她奶奶有逗人开心的本事。

sentences.en: Her grandmother mumbled in her sleep.
sentences.cn: 她祖母含混不清地说着梦话。

sentences.en: Her grandmother seemed to her a pitiable figure.
sentences.cn: 祖母在她看来是个可怜的人。

sentences.en: His grandmother spun him a yarn at the fire.
sentences.cn: 他奶奶在火炉边给他讲故事.

sentences.en: It was raining. The little girl helped her grandmother forward difficultly.
sentences.cn: 下雨了, 那个小女孩扶着她的祖母艰难地走着.

sentences.en: It was sad to see all grandmother's lovely things being auctioned off.
sentences.cn: 眼看着祖母那些可爱的东西全都被拍卖掉,心里真不好受.

sentences.en: My father often speaks of my grandmother.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸常常提起我的祖母。

sentences.en: My grandmother and aunt will be there in my parents' stead.
sentences.cn: 我的祖母和姑妈将代替我的父母出席。

sentences.en: My grandmother died of grief soon after her husband's death.
sentences.cn: 祖父去世不久,祖母就因悲伤过度而死了.

sentences.en: My grandmother tends to go to bed early every day.
sentences.cn: 我祖母每天通常比较早睡.
我的祖母和外祖母都是寡妇。

sentences.en: My great-grandmother was old and witchy looking.
sentences.cn: 我的曾祖母年纪很大，看上去像个巫婆。

sentences.en: She cast a wry glance in her grandmother's direction.
sentences.cn: 她朝奶奶无可奈何地瞟了一眼。

sentences.en: She looks disconcertingly like a familiar aunt or grandmother.
sentences.cn: 令人疑惑的是，她看上去就像一位面熟的邻家阿姨或是祖母。

sentences.en: She was forever running errands for her housebound grandmother.
sentences.cn: 她总是在为她不方便外出的祖母跑前跑后。

sentences.en: The body of her grandmother reposes in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 她祖母的遗体长眠于教堂的墓地中。

words.tran_cn: 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母

phrases.phrase: teach one's grandmother to suck eggs

trans.tran_en: the mother of your mother or father
the mother of your mother or father
